topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdf1476368723487e31d00#post_54bdf1476368723487e31d00

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdf19663687257758b0600#post_54bdf19663687257758b0600
I remember when I was a kid I always saw on Cartoons people go "Warm milk always helps you go to sleep"

So me being a stupid kid got a HUGE CUP of milk and _*stuffed it into the microwave for five minutes*_

And I didn't even wait for it to cool down, I just grabbed the cup and drank it.

Lets just say I couldn't eat food for weeks.

Tong was BLISTERED.

And I split my *entire* heal open backing up into the side of a broken mirror and I just laughed about it.
